name: observe-element-in-viewport
description: Wrapper around IntersectionObserver to hide away its weirdness and increase ease of usability

scripts.build: npm run build:umd && npm run build:esm
scripts.watch: fswatch -0 -o src/index.ts ./tsconfig.es5.umd.json ./tsconfig.es9.esm.json | xargs -0 -n1 -I% `which bash` -c 'echo "----Starting building and bundling at $(date)---" && npm run build && echo "----Done building and bundling at $(date)---"'
